hero.name: Amr Mousa
hero.title: Backend Engineer
hero.subtitle: Building scalable systems and AI-powered solutions

about.title: About Me
about.text: A passionate Backend Engineer with expertise in building robust, scalable systems. Specialized in cloud architecture, API design, and machine learning integration. Committed to writing clean, maintainable code and solving complex technical challenges.

items.description: Led development of microservices architecture, improved API performance by 40%, and mentored junior developers. Architected cloud-native solutions supporting 50K+ daily active users.
Designed and implemented scalable database solutions, deployed applications on AWS, and established CI/CD pipelines. Reduced deployment time by 60% through automation.
Developed RESTful APIs using Node.js and Python, worked with MongoDB and PostgreSQL, and contributed to backend optimization. Increased API throughput by 35%.

items.title: E-Commerce Platform
items.description: Scalable microservices architecture handling 10K+ concurrent users

items.title: AI Chat System
items.description: Real-time conversational AI with natural language processing

items.title: Analytics Dashboard
items.description: Real-time data visualization with predictive analytics

items.name: Sarah Johnson
items.text: Amr is an exceptional engineer who consistently delivers high-quality solutions. His architectural insights and problem-solving abilities are invaluable to our team.

items.name: Ahmed Hassan
items.text: Working with Amr was a game-changer for our project. He transformed our legacy system into a modern, scalable architecture with remarkable efficiency.

items.name: Emily Chen
items.text: Amr's dedication to code quality and continuous learning set him apart. He's not just a developer; he's a problem solver and team player.
